articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Navy Unit 597
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects KPA Navy Unit 597
Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected KPA Navy Unit 597.
					 He first went to the room dedicated to the history of the unit.
					
					 Looking round historic relics and data associated with the sacred traces of President Kim Il Sung, he said that the immortal revolutionary exploits of the President who worked heart and soul for the strengthening of the Juche-oriented navy would remain long in the history of the country.
					
					 He made sure that the feats performed by the successive commanding officers and seamen to implement the WPK's military line were glorified.
					
					 He learned about the unit's performance of duty and training and set forth the tasks to be fulfilled by it to increase its combat capability.
					
					 After making the rounds of a library and other cultural and educational facilities, he praised the unit for having furnished the centers for ideological and cultural education with rich educational materials and cultural means and briskly conducted diverse political and cultural work.
					
					 He got familiar with the management of the unit and expressed great satisfaction over the fact that it has kept the exterior and interior of the barracks neat and clean and created an excellent environment.
					
					 The Songun culture has been generalized throughout the society, rapidly changing the appearance of the country now standing close to the gate of a thriving nation, he noted.
					
					 Then he inspected the company under the direct control of the unit.
					
					 He watched the servicemen of the company in training before looking round an education room, a bedroom, wash-cum-bath house and other places to take deep care of their service and living.
					
					 He had a photo session with the servicepersons of the unit.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jang Song Thaek, member of the NDC and department director of the WPK Central Committee, and KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Heads of State and Governments
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Heads of State and Governments
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly who is attending the 15th NAM summit, Thursday met and had a talk with Muhammad Hosni Mubarak, president of Egypt.
					 Present there were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and the DPRK ambassador to Egypt from the DPRK side and the secretary of Information of the Presidency of Egypt from the Egyptian side.
					
					 On the same day, Kim separately met and had talks with Madav Kumar Nepal, prime minister of Nepal, and George Yong－Boon Yeo, foreign minister of Singapore.
					
					 Kim separately met and had talks with Omar Hassan Ahmed Al－Bashir, president of Sudan, Datuk Seri Mohamad Najib Bin Tun Haji Abudul Razak, prime minister of Malaysia, and Kasit Piromya, foreign minister of Thailand, Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Jung Rin Meets Chairman of WFDY
articles.content:
Kim Jung Rin Meets Chairman of WFDY
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a friendly talk with Tiago Alexandre Ferraz Vieira, chairman of the World Federation of Democratic Youth, on Friday at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 On the occasion the chairman wished the Korean people and youth great success in their efforts to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012 commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Greetings to FM of Sudan
articles.content:
Greetings to FM of Sudan
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a message of greetings to his Sudanese counterpart Deng Alor on June 20 on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the establishment of the DPRK-Sudan diplomatic ties.
					 Expressing belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the Sudanese foreign minister great success in his work.

articles.title: Officials in Educational Field Make Study Tour of Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Officials in Educational Field Make Study Tour of Area of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Officials in the field of education across the country made a study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu from July 8 to 15.
					 They placed floral baskets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung in the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower, on the shore of Lake Samji and at Chongbong Bivouac and the mosaic portraying the three commanders of Mt. Paektu in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu and paid tribute in humble reverence.
					
					 They visited the revolutionary battle site at the Kusi Barrage and the Pochonbo Revolutionary Museum in Pochonbo and the relics and barked trees bearing slogans preserved in the Chongbong and Konchang Bivouacs and the Pegaebong Guerrilla Camp.
					
					 They also visited the Samjiyon Grand Monument, sub-theme group sculptures and the Samjiyon Revolutionary Museum as well as the area of Samjiyon Township that has undergone a change beyond recognition.
					
					 They climbed the top of Mt. Paektu, recollecting with deep emotion the revolutionary history and undying feats of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 The next stop of their visit was the secret camp in Mt. Paektu, the holy place of revolution.
					
					 At leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp they looked round relics, being briefed on the fact that he was born in a humble log cabin and grew up to be a great revolutionary.
					
					 During the study tour they held such colorful political and cultural events as a meeting to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas read by them and an art performance.

articles.title: New Medical Books Issued
articles.content:
New Medical Books Issued
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Medical Science Publishing House has recently brought out new books which can contribute to the health promotion of the working people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The book "Bio-medicament Manufacturing Technology" consists of the general and the particular.
					
					 The part of the general deals with raw materials of bio-medicaments, various technologies for separating and refining bio-medicaments and latest data on bio-engineering methods for manufacturing bio-medicaments such as  genetic engineering, enzyme engineering, microbial engineering and cell engineering.
					
					 The part of the particular deals with the manufacturing technology and method of individual medicament such as lipid medicament, carbohydrate medicament, protein medicament and enzyme medicament and the explanations of their structure, nature, pharmacological action and administration.
					
					 The book "Molecular Control of Metabolism of Lipoprotein" synthesizes and systematizes the research data made in the country up to now in the molecular biological research into the lipoprotein metabolism.
					
					 The book "Koryo Medicine Plastering Remedy" deals with unique and effective Koryo medical treatment methods created by Korean people in the protracted fight against diseases. It introduces 497 prescriptions to 93 diseases and explains in detail the treatment method of each disease, treatment efficacy and reference materials.
					
					 The book "Liquor Treatment" gives the base and kind of liquor treatment, diagnosis and clinical data for it. The book advances applied questions for the liquor treatment of the symptoms of various diseases and gives answers to them.
					
					 The book "Prevention and Treatment of Food Poisoning" gives health disorder caused by food spoil by protozoan and parasite which had been out of the category of food poisoning and other reasons, and its prevention and treatment, folk remedy, measures against food poisoning cases along with secret to hygienic cooking of foodstuffs and records of food poisoning in various countries.

articles.title: Songdowon Recreation Resort
articles.content:
Songdowon Recreation Resort
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- There is the Songdowon Recreation Resort, a scenic spot on the east coast, in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province.
					 It has ten-odd districts including the popular cultural education district, the Mt. Jangdok sightseeing district, the sea bathing district, the Songdowon International Children's Camp district and the rest home district.
					
					 There are an open-air theater and other facilities for cultural education, esplanade and sightseeing road extending tens of kilometers and various facilities, white sandy beach, sweet brier ground, boating-ground and others.
					
					 Seen in the recreation resort are well-arranged camping buildings, rest buildings furnished with various cultural and amusement facilities and public service amenities, soft drink stands and other service establishments.
					
					 Holiday-makers can enjoy themselves in the Wonsan branch of the Central Zoo, botanical garden and flower garden where colorful flowers bloom every season emitting fragrant odor.
					
					 Growing in the resort are hundreds of thousands of plants including Metasequoia glyptostroboides, fir and white birch. Their kinds account to a thousand and hundreds. 
					
					 Several bathing booths were built recently in the forms of sea-gull, sail, anchor and others on the bathing beach.
					
					 The resort is making a great contribution to health promotion of working people and their cultural and emotional life.

articles.title: Juche Idea, Root of Songun Idea
articles.content:
Juche Idea, Root of Songun Idea
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Songun idea, the source of the invincible strength of the Korean army and people, has the principles of the great Juche idea as its root.
					 The Songun idea is based on the principle of the Juche idea on defending and realizing the independence of the popular masses, country and nation.
					
					 The Juche idea regards the independence as life of the social human- being, country and nation and demands that all the problems arising in the revolution and construction should be solved independently.
					
					 The Songun idea is an out-and-out independent idea. It, proceeding from the Juche idea, calls for attaching importance to arms, strongest weapon for defending and realizing independence, and for accomplishing the independent cause of popular masses in strict reliance on it.
					
					 Fully embodied in the Songun idea is the principle of the Juche idea on intensifying the driving force of the revolution and enhancing its role.
					
					 The Juche idea regards the mighty driving force of the revolution as the basic factor for the victory in the revolution. It thus demands that the driving force be strengthened and its role enhanced so as to settle all the problems arising in the revolution and construction.
					
					 The Songun idea based on this principle is a scientific revolutionary line on firmly building the motive force of the revolution with the revolutionary army as the core and model and raising its role remarkably.
					
					 It also is based on Juche-based theory on ideology on holding the thought of people as the main in the revolution and construction.
					
					 The Juche idea elucidates that the ideological consciousness plays the decisive role in the activities of people. On the basis of this, it has put forward the Juche-based theory on ideology.
					
					 The Songun idea demands that the revolutionary soldier spirit of the revolutionary army be generalized in the whole society to push ahead with the revolution and construction and holds that the might of arms is precisely ideological and spiritual strength of the revolutionary army.
					
					 Embodied in the Songun idea is the principle of the Juche idea on firmly ensuring the leader's guidance over the revolution and construction.
					
					 The Juche idea demands of establishing the revolutionary outlook of Juche with the outlook on the leader as its core and carrying on the revolution and construction under the monolithic guidance of the leader.
					
					 The Songun idea is the revolutionary idea with the main stress on the leader. It expounds that all the members of the society should uphold the idea and guidance of the leader with the revolutionary army as a model and thoroughly establish the Songun leadership system, the monolithic guidance system of the leader.
					
					 As seen above, the Songun idea is an idea which has been developed in depth on the basis of the principles of the Juche idea and is the guideline of the Songun revolution which makes it possible to embody the theories and principles of the Juche idea and to meet their requirements to the fullest.

articles.title: Unwarranted Suppression of Jongyojo Blasted
articles.content:
Unwarranted Suppression of Jongyojo Blasted 
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union (Jongyojo) of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 13 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for its unwarranted suppression of the participants in the movement for issuing declarations on the situation. 
					 A press release read out at the conference accused the Lee group of enforcing harsh dictatorship in a bid to stamp out Jongyojo in the wake of the publication of the "teachers' declaration for democracy".
					
					 The press release said: 
					
					The authorities are driving riff-raffs to threaten and appease the teachers not to sign the declarations. They are even threatening them that they would label those teachers manufacturing and carrying signature papers and rendering cooperation to them as participants in the movement. 
					
					 The Ministry of Education, Science and Technology issued an instruction that official papers defining the movement of the teachers as "illegal" be sent to the schools to hold in check the movement.
					
					 The authorities are conducting an investigation into all the teachers of Jongyojo, blustering that they would confirm those who participated in the action of issuing the first declaration on the situation. They went the lengths of calling out even the teachers giving lessons for questioning. 
					
					 Such reckless acts are human rights abuses and unimaginably shameless actions. Jongyojo would brave any crackdown in order to protect the legitimate rights of the teachers and achieve social democracy.

articles.title: Moves to Railroad Evil Bill on Media Slammed
articles.content:
Moves to Railroad Evil Bill on Media Slammed
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Figures of civic and public organizations and representatives of opposition parties including the Democratic Labor Party held a meeting on July 14 to denounce the "Grand National Party" for working hard to railroad the evil bill aimed at putting the media under its control through the "National Assembly", according to MBC of south Korea. 
					 If the GNP and the NA speaker opt for ramming the bill through the NA defying the protest of people from all walks of life, they will face the strong resistance of the people, they warned. 
					
					 In another development, spokesmen for the opposition parties in their joint statement demanded an immediate retraction of the GNP-introduced "draft amendment to a law on broadcasting services" which allows the conservative newspapers and big businesses to put the broadcasting services under their control.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Peruvian and Syrian figures made public statements on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The secretary general of the Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism in his statement on July 6 said that the greatness of the idea and exploits of Kim Il Sung have been proved in revolutionary practices and through historical events.
					
					 The validity of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, fathered by the President is clearly evidenced by the present reality, he said, adding that thanks to his immortal exploits the DPRK has achieved great successes in all the fabrics of society under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Saber Ballul, department head of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus of Syria, in his statement issued on July 7 noted that Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea, and, on this basis, built a genuine socialist system centered on the popular masses.
					
					 He wished the Korean people advancing under the banner of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, greater progress and prosperity. Kim Il Sung will always be alive in the hearts of the world progressives desirous of freedom, independence and justice, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- Book and photo exhibitions and lectures were held in Romania, Ukraine and Guinea between June 27 and July 10 to commemorate the 15th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venues were works of the peerlessly great persons, photos on their immortal revolutionary exploits and books and photos of the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Speeches were made.
					
					 The representative of the Romanian branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain said that the Juche idea fathered by Kim Il Sung serves as the only guideline for independence of the popular masses. It is arousing great sympathy from the progressive people for its truth, validity and vitality, he added.
					
					The chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association said that Kim Il Sung is the founding-father as he built the DPRK which is the first people's country in the Korean nation's history of 5,000 years and a socialist power unshakable in any storm of history.
					
					 The chairman of the Association for the Study of Songun Policy in a city of Ukraine said that the life of Kim Il Sung is the brilliant life of the great revolutionary and the father of the people unprecedented in the human history. And he highly praised the undying exploits of Kim Il Sung who fathered the immortal Juche idea, defeated the two imperialist formidable enemies in one generation and built the socialist system centered on the popular masses in Korea.
					
					 The director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea noted that the Korean people are translating into reality what Kim Il Sung desired in his lifetime, holding him in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK. The world progressives' reverence for the President, a peerlessly great man, is growing deeper as the days go by, the speaker stressed.

articles.title: Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held
articles.content:
Events for Solidarity with Korean People Held
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- An opening ceremony of the week of a Korean book and photo exhibition was held by the Ugandan National Women's Council and film shows were arranged by the Bruno Taekwon-Do Club of the Czech Taekwon-Do Federation, the Slovak Taekwon-Do Federation and an export and import company of Malaysia from June 29 to July 9 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					Put on display in the venue of the book and photo exhibition were photos on the Songun leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos of the Korean people in their struggle for national reunification and books and photos on the U.S. imperialists, provocateurs of the Korean war.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched Korean films "Matchless Military Paraders " and "Order No. 027".

articles.title: Birth Centenary of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Nigeria
articles.content:
Birth Centenary of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian preparatory committee to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated with due ceremony on July 8.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party and former deputy president of the Senate of Nigeria, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the inaugural ceremony.
					
					 It was stressed at the ceremony that the preparatory committee should briskly introduce the greatness of Kim Il Sung and his wise leadership and immortal exploits to the Nigerian people.

articles.title: Bulletins Issued
articles.content:
Bulletins Issued
 Pyongyang, July 17 (KCNA) -- The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association on July 7 released the bulletin entitled "Pioneer of the Korean Proletarian Revolution Kim Hyong Jik" on the occasion of the 115th birth anniversary of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter and outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea.
					 An article of the bulletin said that what was important in the life of Kim Hyong Jik was that he expounded the idea of Jiwon (aim high). This reflects the spirit of national independence, the idea of uninterrupted revolution that the independence of Korea should be achieved by Koreans themselves, it noted.
					
					 Referring to the exploits performed by Kim Hyong Jik in the history of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea, the article stressed that it is the exploit of special mention that he brought up President Kim Il Sung to be a great revolutionary.
					
					 On the same day, the Colombian Kanggye Group for the Study of Juche Idea issued the bulletin entitled "Great Man Who Brought about Dawn of Modern Korea".
					
					 The bulletin said Kim Hyong Jik was the outstanding leader of the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea as he devoted his life to the struggle for freeing the country from the Japanese imperialists' military occupation. It elaborated on the fact that he formed the Korean National Association and wisely led the anti-Japanese national liberation movement in Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona Unidad Naval No. 597 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona Unidad Naval No. 597 del EPC
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC), inspecciono la Unidad No. 597 de las Fuerzas Maritimas del EPC.
					  El Dirigente recorrio primero la  sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					  Viendo los objetos y datos historicos que muestran las sagradas huellas de direccion del Presidente   Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente apunto que seran registradas eternamente en los anales de la patria las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del gran Lider quien realizo ingentes esfuerzos fisicos y espirituales por el fortalecimiento de las autoctonas fuerzas maritimas.
					
					  Evaluo altamente los meritos de los sucesivos comandantes y masas militares quienes lucharon dedicando toda su fuerza y alma por materializar la linea militar del partido.
					
					  Tras averiguar el estado de cumplimiento de la mision y de entrenamiento de la unidad, presento las tareas para incrementar la combatividad de ella.
					
					Durante su recorrido por la biblioteca y otras instalaciones culturales y de educacion, el Comandante Supremo encomio el hecho de que la Unidad libra dinamicamente diversas labores politicas y culturales usando abundantes materiales de educacion y medios culturales instalados en las bases de educacion ideologica y cultural.
					
					Al hacer conocimiento del estado de administracion de la Unidad, se mostro muy satisfecho por la limpieza del exterior y el interior del cuartel y el magnifico medioambiente.
					
					Gracias a la generalizacion en toda la sociedad de la cultura del Songun (priorizacion militar), se torna cada dia mas maravillosa la imagen de nuestra patria que esta llegando al umbral de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Acto seguido, el Comandante Supremo inspecciono la compania adscrita directamente a la Unidad.
					
					Despues de ver el entrenamiento de los militares de la compania, recorrio la sala de educacion, el dormitorio, el bano y otros lugares prestando profunda atencion a la labor y la vida de los marineros.
					
					Al final, se fotografio con los uniformados de la Unidad.
					
					Le acompanaron el miembro del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, y los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con jefes de Estado y gobierno de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con jefes de Estado y gobierno de varios paises
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, quien participa en la 15a Cumbre de los Paises No Alineados, departio el dia 16 con el presidente de la Republica Arabe de Egipto, Mohamed Hosni Mubarak.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el vicecanciller Pak Kil Yon y el embajador coreano en Egipto, y por la egipcia, el secretario de informacion de la presidencia.
					
					  El mismo dia, Kim converso por separado con el premier de la Republica Democratica Federal de Nepal, Madav Kumar Nepal, y con el canciller de la Republica de Singapur, George Yong-Boon Yeo.
					
					   El dia 15, el se reunio tambien por separado con el presidente de la Republica de Sudan, Omar Hassan Ahmed Al-Bashir, el premier de Malasia, Datuk Seri Mohamad Najib Bin Tun Haji Abudul Razak, y con el canciller del Reino de Tailandia, Kasit Piromya.

articles.title: Nuevos libros medicos
articles.content:
Nuevos libros medicos
  Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, la Editorial Ciencia Medica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio a luz nuevos libros para el fomento de la salud de los trabajadores.
					  El libro "Tecnologia de Manufactura de bio-medicamento" esta compuesto de la argumentacion general y la detallada.
					
					  La parte de la general se refiere a las materias primas de dicho medicamento, el metodo de tratamiento de proteina, varias tecnicas necesarias a disgregarlo y purificarlo y los datos ultramodernos sobre la metodologia  biotecnica para la elaboracion de dicha medicina incluyendo la ingenieria genetica, la enzimologia, la microbiologia y la ingenieria celular.
					
					  La parte de la detallada recompila minuciosamente las tecnicas y metodos de elaboracion de medicamentos biologicos individuales, entre ellas, el carbohidrato, la albumina y la enzima y explica la estructura, el caracter y la funcion medicinal de esos medicamentos y su uso. 
					
					  El libro "El Control molecular de metabolismo de Lipoproteina" sintetiza y sistematiza los datos de investigacion criolla aclarados hasta la fecha en el estudio de la biotecnologia molecular sobre el metabolismo de lipoproteina.
					
					  El libro "El metodo de tratamiento de la medicina Coryo" redacta los especiales y eficientes metodos de tratamiento de la medicina Coryo creados por el pueblo coreano en el largo proceso de tratamiento medico.
					
					  El libro presenta las 497 recetas sobre las 93 enfermedades principales, explica la concepcion de la medicina contemporanea sobre cada enfermedad y la causa de su surgimiento segun la medicina Coryo y da minuciosamente los metodos y eficiencias de cura y otros contenidos de referencia.
					
					  El libro "Tratamiento de liquido" da a conocer la base, el genero y la diagnosis de tal cura y los datos clinicos.
					
					  Tambien, este libro presenta los problemas aplicados de esta cura sobre los sintomas que se presentan en la cura de varias enfermedades y los metodos de su solucion.
					
					  Entre los nuevos libros figuran "La prevencion y la cura de intoxicacion alimentaria", etc.

articles.title: Zona de Recreo de Songdowon
articles.content:
Zona de Recreo de Songdowon
Pyongyang, 17 de julio (ATCC) -- En la ciudad de Wonsan de la provincia de Kangwon esta la Zona de Recreo de Songdowon, balneario famoso del Mar Este de Corea.
					  Ella consta de mas de 10 repartos incluyendo el de educacion cultural masiva, el de excursion al monte Jangdok, el de la playa, el del Campamento Internacional de Ninos de Songdowon y el de casas de reposo.
					
					  Se ven ahi un anfiteatro y otros establecimientos culturales y educacionales, las rutas de excursion y paseo de decenas de kilometros, la playa blanca en forma de cinturon, el jardin de escaramujos, el area de paseo en botes, etc.
					
					  Tambien se encuentran los campamentos originalmente construidos, las casas de reposo provistas de aparatos de diversiones e instalaciones de servicio publico, la red de servicios gastronomicos como la refresqueria.
					
					  Ademas, saltan a la vista la sucursal del Jardin Zoologico Nacional en Wonsan, el jardin botanico y el de flores donde se puede pasar agradables momentos de descanso disfrutando la fragancia de las aromas florales.
					
					  En la zona habitan cientos de miles de arboles de mil y cientos de variedades incluyendo Metasequoia glyptostroboides, el abeto y el abedul. 
					
					   Recientemente, fueron construidas en la extensa playa de Songdowon unas cabinas magnificas en formas de gaviota, vela y ancla 
					
					  Hoy dia, la Zona de Recreo de Songdowon contribuye mucho al fomento de la salud y a la vida cultural de los trabajadores.
